mapper.sql: ID, TITLE, NAME, START_TIME, END_TIME, VALUE, TARGET_NUM, ACTION, ITEMS, THE_SWITCH, WITH_AWARD, IS_DELETED, PATH, CHARACTER_ID, ACHIEVEMENT_ACTION, ACTIVITY_NAME, DESCRIPTION, BACK_UP, UNIT, UNIT_TYPE
mapper.select:
select count(*) from SYS_ACTIVITY where 1=1
and ( ID like '${searchValue}%' or `NAME` like '${searchValue}%' or `TITLE` like '${searchValue}%')
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_ACTIVITY (ID, TITLE, NAME, START_TIME, END_TIME, VALUE, TARGET_NUM, ACTION, ITEMS, THE_SWITCH, WITH_AWARD, IS_DELETED, PATH, CHARACTER_ID, ACHIEVEMENT_ACTION, ACTIVITY_NAME, DESCRIPTION, BACK_UP, UNIT, UNIT_TYPE) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{value,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{targetNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{action,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{items,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{theSwitch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{withAward,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{characterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{achievementAction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backUp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unitType,jdbcType=INTEGER})

(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.value,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.targetNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.action,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.items,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.theSwitch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.withAward,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isDeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.characterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.achievementAction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.backUp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.unit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.unitType,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update SYS_ACTIVITY
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VALUE = #{value,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TARGET_NUM = #{targetNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ACTION = #{action,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ITEMS = #{items,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
THE_SWITCH = #{theSwitch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WITH_AWARD = #{withAward,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATH = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHARACTER_ID = #{characterId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ACHIEVEMENT_ACTION = #{achievementAction,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ACTIVITY_NAME = #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BACK_UP = #{backUp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UNIT_TYPE = #{unitType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update SYS_ACTIVITY set TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VALUE = #{value,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TARGET_NUM = #{targetNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ACTION = #{action,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ITEMS = #{items,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, THE_SWITCH = #{theSwitch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WITH_AWARD = #{withAward,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PATH = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHARACTER_ID = #{characterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ACHIEVEMENT_ACTION = #{achievementAction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ACTIVITY_NAME = #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BACK_UP = #{backUp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UNIT_TYPE = #{unitType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
